## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e82fdaff3ca695549ece2759641cf172c0cc80bbac95e6d0c8a6b81f5415db1a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'cryostar' @ 912.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
